actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-1040.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 6067) to amend chapter 44, title 18, United States Code, to regulate the manufacture and importation of armor piercing ammunition, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 6067 (armor piercing ammunition).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 6067) to amend chapter 44, title 18, United States Code, to regulate the manufacture and importation of armor piercing ammunition, and for other purposes.
